message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your budget, but $200 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you consider that price?
